mapper.sql: GOOD_ID, GOOD_CODE, GOOD_NAME, GOOD_RYPE, GOOD_SIZE, GOOD_VALUE, GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, GOOD_IMPORTANCE, GOOD_IMAGE
mapper.select:
select
from wms_goods where GOOD_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into wms_goods(GOOD_CODE, GOOD_NAME, GOOD_RYPE, GOOD_SIZE, GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, GOOD_IMPORTANCE, GOOD_IMAGE) values (#{goodCode}, #{name}, #{type}, #{size}, #{carNumber}, #{goodImportance}, #{goodImage})

insert into wms_goods(GOOD_CODE, GOOD_NAME, GOOD_RYPE, GOOD_SIZE, GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, GOOD_IMPORTANCE, GOOD_IMAGE) values
(#{goods.goodCode},#{goods.name},#{goods.type},#{goods.size}, #{goods.carNumber}, #{goods.goodImportance}, #{goods.goodImage})
mapper.update: update wms_goods set GOOD_CODE = #{goodCode}, GOOD_NAME = #{name}, GOOD_RYPE = #{type}, GOOD_SIZE = #{size}, GOOD_VALUE = #{value}, GOOD_CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber}, GOOD_IMPORTANCE = #{goodImportance}, GOOD_IMAGE = #{goodImage} where GOOD_ID = #{id}
